Name: Old Fashioned
Directions: Muddle together 1/2 teaspoon sugar and 3 dashes bitters in rocks glass. Place a large ice cube in glass then add 2 oz Bourbon. Stir gently and garnish with lemon peel or cherry.

Name: Vodka Martini
Directions: Add ice to cocktail shaker followed by 2 1/2 oz of fine Vodka and 1/2 oz of Dry Vermouth. Shake well until chilled then strain into a martini glass and garnish with olive or lemon peel.
